data.text:
Vio-Lence;

Listed Below is all of the known Tour Dates, Album, E.P. & Singles release dates that I have info on from these Bay Area legends. I know there is a hell of a lot more info out there so if you can help let me know. Ihe tours I know of are usually in red. I'm after any Tickets scans, Tour Posters / Flyers, Tour Shirts, Magazine Adverts etc. hector.kirkwood @ gmail.com

I built this and other pages for some of the bands I like as I could not find any decent info on the net anywhere, these are mainly for my own entertainment but if anyone else enjoys them then it's a bonus, enjoy.

Back to main page.

??/??/1985; Vio-Lence form in the Bay Area (initially as 'Death Penalty'), Perry (d), Phil (g), Eddie (b), Jerry (v) and Troy (g).

??/??/1985; Death Penalty play at least one show before changing the name to Violence, then Vio-Lence.

01/06/1985; Concert at A Party, Dublin, CA, USA. first show.

??/??/1985; not long after forming Eddie (b) leaves, he is replaced by Deen.

28/09/1985; Concert at Ruthie's Inn, San Francisco, CA, USA. opening for Legacy & Blind Illusion.

23/11/1985; Concert at Ruthie's Inn, San Francisco, CA, USA. opening for Legacy & Hellhound.

28/12/1985; Concert at Ruthie's Inn, San Francisco, CA, USA. opening for Sentinel Beast, Hellhound & asst.

- - - - -

17/01/1986; Concert at Ruthie's Inn, San Francisco, CA, USA. with Annihilation, Forbidden Evil & Genocide.

01/02/1986; Concert at The Rock On Broadway, San Francisco, CA, USA. opening for Joker & Hellhound.

07/02/1986; Concert at Ruthie's Inn, San Francisco, CA, USA. opening for Death Angel & Attitude Adjustment.

??/??/1986; at some point in early 1986 Jerry (v) leaves, Sean replaces him.

07/06/1986; Concert at Ruthie's Inn, San Francisco, CA, USA. opening for Heathen, Annihilation & Tyrannicide. Sean Killian's first show.

22/08/1986; Concert at Ruthie's Inn, San Francisco, CA, USA. opening for D.R.I. & Blind Illusion.

19/09/1986; Concert at Ruthie's Inn, San Francisco, CA, USA. opening for Legacy, Ruffians & Heathen.

??/??/1986; at some point the spelling of the band name changes from 'Violence' to 'Vio-Lence'.

14/11/1986; Concert at The Farm, San Francisco, CA, USA. opening for Death Angel & Heathen, with Mercenary.

15/11/1986; Concert at The Rock On Broadway, San Francisco, CA, USA. opening for The Mentors, with Blood Bath.

??/12/1986; 'Vio-Lence' four song demo released, exact date unknown.

20/12/1986; Concert at The Rock On Broadway, San Francisco, CA, USA. opening for Blind Illusion, with Betrayal.

??/??/2001; Summer 2001 Vio-Lence reunite for a one off show; Sean (v), Perry (d), Dean (b), Phil (g) and Steve (g).

??/??/2001; although only meant to be a one-off show Vio-Lence play a few more shows in 2001-2003, both Ray & Troy fill in on guitar.

19/04/2003; Concert at The Pound, San Francisco, CA, USA. with Pissing Razors & asst. last show until 2019.

??/??/2005; 'Eternal Nightmare' re-issued as a 2cd set with a bonus live disc of the 14/12/2001 show.

??/??/2005; 'Oppressing The Masses/Torture Tactics' compilation released, with two bonus demo tracks.

08/08/2006; 'Blood & Dirt' dvd released, live from San Francisco 1987/1993/2001/2003.

06/11/2015; 'Eternal Nightmare' reissued on vinyl with the Mechanic four song demo & one unreleased track.
